Norie Kimchii Cleanser

Brand: Norie

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water (Aqua); Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine; Glycerin; Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate; Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate (Fermented Daikon Radish); Salicylic Acid (2% BHA); Betaine (Upcycled Sugar Beets); Pyrus Malus (Upcycled Apple Fruit Extract); Sodium Chloride

ct); Sodium Chloride; 1-2 Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Arginine, Fucus Vesiculosus (Seaweed) Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
